summary: An 8 piece sexy barbarian priestess armor based on a Hermaeus Mora aesthetic. Available as armor (heavy or light) or clothing.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://33.media.tumblr.com/854f7f9a66694f8a753a47e33896f7cf/tumblr_nbs1tgao381tkwwx1o1_1280.jpg[/img]


[img]https://38.media.tumblr.com/280d6da63e9ccea7f4b1da4475ac6d8b/tumblr_nbs1tgao381tkwwx1o3_400.jpg[/img]
An 8 piece Barbarian Priestess Armor based on the CNHF2.5 Barbarian Variant uploaded by calyps released on his blog. Can be crafted under Daedric and requires Ebony Ingots and some Linen Wraps to craft. Can be improved twice as much with the Daedric Armor Perk and some Daedra Hearts. Boots are just retextured Daedric boots. 

Armor Parts List:
Tiara
Cuirass
Gauntlets
Back Tentacles
Upper Back Tentacles
Boob cups
Boots
Loin Cloth
(bonus) Another Cuirass

[img]https://33.media.tumblr.com/859a802cf6b2f4e41b5f01b6a1374f19/tumblr_nbs1tgao381tkwwx1o4_400.jpg[/img]
Simple drag and drop data\ folder into the Skyrim directory. Activate comvex-hmpriestess.esp in data files or the mod manager of your choice.

[img]https://38.media.tumblr.com/be24f72fb34d201728c7c40463eb74cb/tumblr_nbs1tgao381tkwwx1o2_400.jpg[/img]
Any CNHF2.5, UNP/B, or Vanilla body textures.

[youtube]z-cHYLjvdn4[/youtube]

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?list=UUBRmzqswNKBPnUZW2df3DPw&v=p_nKABjeBVg&feature=player_detailpage#t=491]Just HM Priestess[/url]
